contentrichtext.text: {{Selfref|For the gender gap on Wikimedia projects, see [[meta:Gender gap]]}} '''Gender gap''' may refer to: *[[Gender pay gap]] *[[Income disparity]] by gender in a purely economic context *The ''[[Global Gender Gap Report]]'' *[[Father's rights]] in child custody determinations of family courts *Workers number gap, the difference between the numbers of men and women in a profession. See [[Gender role]] *Unbalanced [[sex ratio]] See also: *[[Sex differences in humans]] in a general psycho-social context {{disambig}}
